title: Border, 19th century
medium:
Medium: 
Technique: bobbin lace, late Valencienne ground
description: A rose vine flowing horizontally with hanging rose wreaths. A scalloped edge formed by large and small roses. A naturalistic effect is attempted in the large roses with shading.
